data.actual_result: The tag is reverted to its state before autocompletion and then your message is added after it
data.expected_result: The tag should remain and the message should be typed after it
data.short_description: Autocompleted mention tags are overwritten when you begin typing your message
data.steps_to_repro: - Type the @ character and the first few letters of a users name - Click on the user to autocomplete the tag - Type your message
